result.execSummary:
The defendant Kelly J. Apkarian was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Theft-Movable Property <=$2500 [Modifiers: Repeater], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.20(1)(a).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: Maintain full time work/school or combination of the two, and if not so fully engaged, complete 9 hours CS per week.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Prosecutor

records.addlTxt: w/Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief

Clerk: Amanda. 
Case called at 2:10 pm.
INCLUDES: 22CM128, 22CM795 and 22CT44. 
State appears by ADA Lacey Coonen.  Defendant appears, and with Attorney 

Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights filed.  VRCW.

State moves to: 
22CM128 --
AMEND Ct.1 to remove repeater enhancer. 

22CM795 --
Ct.2>>DRI.
Ct.3>>DRI.
Ct.4>>DRI.

22CT44 --
Ct.1>>DRI.

COURT GRANTS ABOVE.

PLEA to:
22CM128 --
Ct.1>>NO CONTEST.

22CM795 --
Ct.1>>NO CONTEST.

COURT advises defendant of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & questions defendant to understanding; 
COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & voluntary made, a factual basis & defendant guilty;

COURT ORDERS: 
22CM128 --
Ct.1>>SWH for 1 year probation; CONDITIONS: Assessments/Treatment/Counseling deemed appropriate by agent. Maintain full time work/school or combination of the two, and if not so fully engaged, complete 9 hours CS per week. Pay restitution if requested.  Pay CC/DNA surcharge and provide sample.
Court grants 15 days credit. 

22CM795 --
Ct.1>>SWH for 1 year probation; CONDITIONS: Assessments/Treatment/Counseling deemed appropriate by agent. Maintain full time work/school or combination of the two, and if not so fully engaged, complete 9 hours CS per week. Pay restitution if requested.  Pay CC/DNA surcharge and provide sample. 
Court grants 0 days credit. 

No objection to transfer of probation to Marinette County. 

Adj: 2:23 pm.
Plea hearing on September 6, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

Date and time set for initial appearance. VRCW.  
Reading Waived.  Reserve Jurisdiction.

Advised Right of Counsel.

CONDITIONS:

- Prints and photograph.
